CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage who can record and transcribe meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Who can record’ control for meeting organizers to include transcription. With this change, meeting organizers with eligible licenses will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from three options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters, or (3) No one. This way meeting organizers will be able to manage which roles can initiate recording and transcription for a meeting. This functionality will be available to Teams Premium and Copilot for M365 licensed users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage who can record and transcribe meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Who can record’ control for meeting organizers to include transcription. With this change, meeting organizers with a Teams Premium license will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from two options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, or (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters. This control allows meeting organizers to manage which roles are able to initiate recording and transcription for a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Labeling email from attachments' label in Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Outlook on the web will match the highest sensitivity label from attachments on email. Admin could configure this either use the cmdlet set-labelpolicy advanced setting or use the Compliance portal to configure the label policy(Roadmap: 100158). Customer will see automatically or recommendations that email gets the higher label from attachments' label.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
CurrentVersion.description: With Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging web content.  Get assistance drafting your content when creating new pages. Adjust the tone, expand meeting bullets into structured text, or get help making your message more concise. All within our existing commitments to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.description: Cloud IntelliFrame makes non-AI cameras smarter.  With Cloud IntelliFrame, participants in the room appear similar to remote attendees, creating an immersive and engaging experience for everyone. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical character recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in endpoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,This release will extend OCR support from standalone images (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, and PDF) to images embedded inside the following files and file types: Office files (XLSX, DOCX, PPTX), container files (zip, rar, 7z, and more), and PDF files. Image-only PDF files are already supported, and this this release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text.

Image-only PDF files are already supported, and this this release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text.

Additionally, the file viewer will open files up to 50% faster once these updates launch.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: DocuSign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also DocuSign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by DocuSign and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
CurrentVersion.description: There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
OldVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Advanced calling and contact management support on non-touch phones
CurrentVersion.description: On non-touch phones users can use advanced calling features such as park/unpark calls, busy on busy, auto restart, and manage contacts and contact groups.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Advanced calling and contact management support on non-touch phones
OldVersion.description: On non-touch phones users can use advanced calling features such as park/unpark calls, busy on busy, auto restart, and manage contacts and contact groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Autofill columns
CurrentVersion.description: This allows SharePoint Premium users to add natural language prompts to document library columns to extract or generate metadata from an uploaded file's contents.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Autofill columns
OldVersion.description: This allows SharePoint Premium users to add natural language prompts to document library columns to extract or generate metadata from an uploaded file's contents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Workspaces now supports adding highlighting
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge Workspaces users are now able to collaborate in a synchronized way by adding highlighting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Workspaces now supports adding highlighting
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Edge Workspaces users are now able to collaborate in a synchronized way by adding highlighting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updated submission results
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators and security operators will see updated results from submissions. These updates remove any confusion they might have with the current submission result.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updated submission results
OldVersion.description: Administrators and security operators will see updated results from submissions. These updates remove any confusion they might have with the current submission result.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
OldVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
CurrentVersion.description: ,The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail. For example, you could reduce storage space by deleting meeting recordings, even when the OneDrive location has a longer retention policy. The feature also helps with scenarios such as data spillage cleanup and processing right to be forgotten requests.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot assisted Loop Page Creation
CurrentVersion.description:
Collaborate with copilot to go from a blank page to a structured document ready for collaboration as quickly as possible. Start from scratch, or select an existing page or template as the starting point and Copilot can modify it for the task at hand. 

This item is being removed from the roadmap as a duplicate of ID 141443

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot assisted Loop Page Creation
OldVersion.description: Collaborate with copilot to go from a blank page to a structured document ready for collaboration as quickly as possible. Start from scratch, or select an existing page or template as the starting point and Copilot can modify it for the task at hand

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals Graph API's
CurrentVersion.description: The Approvals Graph APIs allows developers to create and manage Approvals from any application. This set of APIs allows users to integrate Approvals with line of business application and automate creation and updates of approvals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals Graph API's
OldVersion.description: The Approvals Graph APIs allows developers to create and manage Approvals from any application. This set of APIs allows users to integrate Approvals with line of business application and automate creation and updates of approvals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
OldVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel chat helper
CurrentVersion.description: Customers can get more conversational answers to a broader range of Excel-related questions and prompts from Copilot. For example, the customer can ask how to accomplish a task and Copilot will respond with helpful steps that may include formulas to copy and use. In some cases, Copilot may explain a formula error and supply the corrected formula plus additional guidance to ensure the formula works properly.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Proactive document summarization
CurrentVersion.description: Automatically see a Copilot-generated summary of a document you open.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share content from webapp (browser) to Teams chats, channels, and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to share content from a standalone Teams webapp (from the browser) to Teams chats, channels and meetings (before and during the meeting).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share content from webapp (browser) to Teams chats, channels, and meetings
OldVersion.description: Users will now be able to share content from a standalone Teams webapp (from the browser) to Teams chats, channels and meetings (before and during the meeting).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage access to meeting artifacts such as meeting transcripts, recordings, AI-generated recap, and Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a new meeting option that gives meeting organizers the flexibility to manage which attendees have access to meeting artifacts such as transcript, recording, AI-generated recap, and Copilot. Meeting organizers can select from three options: (1) People with existing access, (2) Organizers and Co-organizers, or (3) Specific People.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage access to meeting artifacts such as meeting transcripts, recordings, AI-generated recap, and Copilot
OldVersion.description: Introducing a new meeting option that gives meeting organizers the flexibility to manage which attendees have access to meeting artifacts such as transcript, recording, AI-generated recap, and Copilot. Meeting organizers can select from three options: (1) People with existing access, (2) Organizers and Co-organizers, or (3) Specific People.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in Government Community Cloud (GCC)
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using Town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 10k attendees, third-party eCDN support, green room, manage what attendees see, moderated Q&A, RTMP-in, live translated captions and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in Government Community Cloud (GCC) (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using Town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, third-party eCDN support, green room, manage what attendees see, moderated Q&A, RTMP-in, live translated captions and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Record opening behavior improvement in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint)
CurrentVersion.description: ,When a user opens a file in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint) that has a retention label managing the file as a locked record, it will now open as read-only and immediately not allow any user edits. A message will explain to the user why they cannot edit the file. This improvement brings parity to the behavior already in place for the online versions of these Office applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Record opening behavior improvement in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint)
OldVersion.description: When a user opens a file in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint) that has a retention label managing the file as a locked record, it will now open as read-only and immediately not allow any user edits. A message will explain to the user why they cannot edit the file. This improvement brings parity to the behavior already in place for the online versions of these Office applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
CurrentVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
OldVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
CurrentVersion.description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
OldVersion.description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab support for role-based prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to filter Microsoft-authored prompts in Copilot Lab to view those that are associated with a specific job role category, e.g., Marketing, HR, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Closed captioning support in Teams Walkie Talkie
CurrentVersion.description: Walkie Talkie users can now view captions on the walkie talkie home screen, for transmissions being received.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Closed captioning support in Teams Walkie Talkie
OldVersion.description: Walkie Talkie users can now view captions on the walkie talkie home screen, for transmissions being received.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Copilot works on any selection
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot will enable the edit box on any worksheet regardless of selection. Copilot will reason over the nearest table or data range to the customer’s selected grid area on the same worksheet.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Support for Data Ranges Resembling Tables
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot can now reason over data ranges with a single row of headers on top, even when they’re not Excel tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of enabled users and active users, as well as last activity date per user (all up and per Microsoft 365 app).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
OldVersion.description: The Graph API provides access to Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage insights and analytics, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Time Suggestions Update
CurrentVersion.description: We are improving how suggested times are shown when scheduling a meeting. We are removing the automatically shown suggested times and instead you will need to enable a switch - Find a time - if you want to see suggested times. If you enable the toggle, the new availability view on time suggestion tiles will make it easier to find a suitable time with more clarity on everyone's availability. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Official Communities Discovery
CurrentVersion.description: Official Communities are discoverable in the Communities Discovery page. Under Recommended Communities, there is an Official Communities section which highlights the communities that have been verified by the network admins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Suggested M365 content in Callouts
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is an improvement on the Interactivity feature in Microsoft Stream, where users with edit access can add document and other links to Callouts at specific times in a video. The goal of the improvement is to make creating and editing of interactive videos easier and quicker for editors by suggesting resources to link based on their M365 user activity. If there are no relevant suggestions, this allows them to search for resources to make their videos interactive from within Microsoft Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Interactivity analytics
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives audience engagement metrics on interactive Stream videos. Users with edit access to a Stream video that contains links, polls, or callouts will be able to see the number of unique viewers and the percentage of those who viewed or clicked on interactive elements in the video, as well as average number of interactions and average attention time. These metrics help video owners understand which content is most engaging.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone devices will support Private line, a new functionality for Teams Phone that allows you to enable a private second phone number for a select set of users so they can receive inbound calls directly, by passing delegates, admins, or assistants. Calls to the private line are distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: People app on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: An updated People app on Teams phone devices will provide a simplified and faster experience to help users manage contacts easily.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent recording meeting policy support on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: When explicit consent recording meeting policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of participants on Teams phone devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Logs and alerts
CurrentVersion.description: ,With a new Azure Monitor integration, Universal Print customers can send detailed diagnostic logs to a Log Analytics workspace to conduct troubleshooting and configure custom alerts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Generate keyword query language from natural language prompt in eDiscovery with Copilot for Security
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot for Security is embedded in eDiscovery to enable users to provide a search prompt in natural language and will translate into keyword query language to help expedite the start of an eDiscovery search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Compliance boundary cmdlet tool for managing compliance boundary property
CurrentVersion.description: This cmdlet allows users to verify the compliance boundary property of a specific OneDrive site, ensuring that the value is correctly configured. If the property is not set or if the site is in arbitration, users can use this cmdlet to assign the property value for the site for compliance boundary to take effect.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Copilot Compose experience
CurrentVersion.description: ,Major improvements to our Copilot Compose experience include a polished, lightweight UI.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Contact View and Org Chart
CurrentVersion.description: ,This improves the large contact view experience, including the org chart and recent files.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
CurrentVersion.description: Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Blanket custom retention policies which apply to all Audit recordTypes
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is enhancing the Audit custom retention policy experience. With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced incident communication with DLP email templates
CurrentVersion.description: You can now elevate your DLP incident management with the power of customizable email templates designed to send email messages to your stakeholders when an event is generated for DLP Policy match. With dynamic variables and tokens at your disposal, you can effortlessly create and maintain email templates, ensuring consistency and efficiency in your communications, along with a documented audit trail. You can use these email templates to inform end users about incidents, their severity, or the analyst's recommendations; stay on top of remediation efforts by sending follow-up notifications to end users with due dates; keep analysts informed about incident updates and assignments; trigger escalation notifications to managers or other custom targets; notify approvers of pending items with ease; and many more scenarios like these.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling Assistant Updates
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the scheduling assistant view to help users have better readability. Some of these changes are in alignment to customer the feedback. These changes will also improve the grid lines, availability view, adding combined availability bar and much more. These updates will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Channel cards
CurrentVersion.description: Channel cards will provide you quick overview of key information about what is happening within the channel, including who is in the channel and the purpose of the channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: The new Microsoft Purview Portal entering GA
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Purview portal has a streamlined design and unified experience that helps you discover and access data security, risk, and compliance solutions for all your data, wherever it lives across your data estate. This means you can now extend protection across multiple data estates. Additionally, you can also access new features such as global search, new settings experience, and recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Import navigational links from SharePoint into Resources in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: On the desktop experience for Viva Connections, operators will be able to effortlessly import SharePoint links from their home site navigation and global navigation directly into the Resources section.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
CurrentVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
OldVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom emojis and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: User can upload their own custom emojis and reactions to personalize their communication. Emojis will be available within the user’s  tenant in chat and channels via the emoji and reaction menus.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
OldVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage who can record and transcribe meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Who can record’ control for meeting organizers to include transcription. With this change, meeting organizers with eligible licenses will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from three options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters, or (3) No one. This way meeting organizers will be able to manage which roles can initiate recording and transcription for a meeting. This functionality will be available to Teams Premium and Copilot for M365 licensed users.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Labeling email from attachments' label in Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Outlook on the web will match the highest sensitivity label from attachments on email. Admin could configure this either use the cmdlet set-labelpolicy advanced setting or use the Compliance portal to configure the label policy(Roadmap: 100158). Customer will see automatically or recommendations that email gets the higher label from attachments' label.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
CurrentVersion.description: With Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging web content.  Get assistance drafting your content when creating new pages. Adjust the tone, expand meeting bullets into structured text, or get help making your message more concise. All within our existing commitments to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meet now in Teams group chat
CurrentVersion.description: Start a huddle with you colleagues using meet now in group chat. Meet now in group chat is a ringless experience designed to enable ad-hoc, real-time communication with your team in a hybrid environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cloud IntelliFrame for Teams Meeting Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Cloud IntelliFrame makes non-AI cameras smarter.  With Cloud IntelliFrame, participants in the room appear similar to remote attendees, creating an immersive and engaging experience for everyone. Whether working from home or in the office, participants are able to see every facial expression and cue, just as if they were there in person. This feature is available only with the Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Mac
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Provide view-only remote assistance for Mac devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Language selection for users
CurrentVersion.description: Users can select their preferred language within the Viva learning Setting Menu, independent of Teams or Browser language. Preferred language will be persisted across all Viva Learning Surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self Service for bulk uploads
CurrentVersion.description: Improved self-service; Ability to bulk upload customer permissions for improved access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights delegate access for leaders
CurrentVersion.description: New delegate access allows leaders to empower other individuals to view insights about their organization. Those with delegated access will be able to easily navigate to the leader's view of organizational insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: @ mentions within comments
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to @ mention users within comments on a whiteboard, with the associated in-app indicators to inform users of an @ mention.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Email notifications for @ mentions in comments on a whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description: The ability for @mentions within comments on a whiteboard to trigger an email notification to the user, with a link back to the @mention.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Organization-wide template and question customization
CurrentVersion.description: Create organization-wide templates and questions for managers and project leads to use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Support-approved elevation for Endpoint Privilege Management
CurrentVersion.description: Enables elevation requests requested by an end user and approved by the support team

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Mac - Full control
CurrentVersion.description: Provide full control on Mac devices to reduce time to mitigation.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour for Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour for Viva Engage private messages and community conversations, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. Note: We have updated the clouds to reflect the current state. Gov clouds will be forthcoming later during Q4 of this calendar year.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Recommended actions for finetuning policies
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are introducing additional recommended actions to provide guidance on fine-tuning your insider risk policies and implementing advanced configurations. These new tasks and journeys will be accessible through the Recommended Actions page. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We have updated this Roadmap to reflect the current status.  We apologize for any inconveniences.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner App for Teams
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Planner app in Teams is a single, unified work management experience. Assisted by AI, it brings together the simplicity of To Do, the collaboration of Planner and the power of Project into a single and simple solution, that offers individual task management, collaborative work management as well as enterprise work management. Note: The clouds have been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Open and Edit Projects in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Manage your projects along with plans and to-do lists in one simple, familiar experience within the Planner Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Create personal plans in Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Create personal plans in the new Planner app for Teams. For these types of plans, the creator of the plan is the only member and owner.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Auto population of due tasks in My Day
CurrentVersion.description: In the Planner Teams app, your tasks will automatically appear in My Day on their due dates. This will help you stay on top of your priorities and stay organized throughout the day.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Manage all your tasks in My Tasks
CurrentVersion.description: My Tasks within the Planner Teams app shows your tasks across plans, projects, to-do lists and flagged emails so you can quickly triage and track all the work on your plate.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Access all your plans, projects and to do lists in My Plans
CurrentVersion.description: My Plans within the Planner app in Teams brings together all of your plans, projects and to do lists to help you easily discover and find all your work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Analytics for multiple Connections experiences
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, customers using multiple Viva Connections experiences in their tenants will see analytics aggregated at each experience level. There will be no change in how the analytics module is accessed or any metrics provided.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
CurrentVersion.description: ,Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Windows and Android (GCC)
CurrentVersion.description: GCC customers can now use Remote Help on Windows and Android devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use a URL to reference supported files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can copy and paste a link of a supported file into the Draft with Copilot UI as a reference instead of searching for it in the file reference menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Save filters for Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to save the filters applied to Activity Explorer and use them later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Proximity Join via Ultrasound
CurrentVersion.description: With ultrasound for proximity join, users can more accurately discover and add the Teams Room they are in to their Teams meeting. The user's companion device detects ultrasound beacons emitted only within the physical Teams Room, providing a more accurate list of nearby room options on the pre-join meeting screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ultrasound proximity join admin controls for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can use XML files to enable two proximity join settings for Teams Rooms on Windows: enabling ultrasound signals for a user to accurately find and choose a room to join a meeting from, and whether the Teams Rooms automatically accepts the ring from the user's laptop to join the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical character recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in endpoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,This release will extend OCR support from standalone images (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, and PDF) to images embedded inside the following files and file types: Office files (XLSX, DOCX, PPTX), container files (zip, rar, 7z, and more), and PDF files. Image-only PDF files are already supported, and this this release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Updates to file viewer
CurrentVersion.description: The OneDrive file viewer offers a quick and easy way to view your files in OneDrive, Teams, and SharePoint, across all your devices. OneDrive is enhancing the user interface and design of the file viewer to make it more useful and intuitive. We are adding a new toolbar, new panes, and collaboration features. Additionally, the file viewer will open files up to 50% faster once these updates launch.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: DocuSign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also DocuSign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by DocuSign and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Adobe Acrobat Sign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also Adobe Acrobat sign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by Adobe and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint -Update UI/UX admin experience
CurrentVersion.description: Update UI/UX admin experience for advanced configuration settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Restrict unintentional sharing to unallowed cloud apps and services (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to restrict unintentional sharing of sensitive items to unallowed cloud apps and services in macOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
CurrentVersion.description: You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
CurrentVersion.description: There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections Advanced Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Enhancements to the current analytics module for Viva Connections will include the following: daily data for 90 days, user retention metrics, and monthly aggregates for the last 12 months.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to Copy Rule
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this feature, admins will have capability to reuse existing rules and make slight edits instead of creating new rules from scratch every time. This will reduce a lot of manual re-work and boost their productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Annotate PDFs with Text
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows you to annotate and save PDF files with text boxes, when those files are stored in OneDrive and SharePoint. Users can access the annotation feature by opening the PDF in file viewer and selecting “edit”.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Annotate PDFs with Text
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows you to annotate and save PDF files with text boxes, when those files are stored in OneDrive and SharePoint. Users can access the annotation feature by opening the PDF in file viewer and selecting “edit”.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint Pages: New Section Level Content Align
CurrentVersion.description: With Section Level Content Align, authors will now be able to center and bottom align all the webparts within a single section. This will make it easier for all of the columns in your section to be visually harmonious and reduce the need for the spacer webpart.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Advanced calling and contact management support on non-touch phones
CurrentVersion.description: On non-touch phones users can use advanced calling features such as park/unpark calls, busy on busy, auto restart, and manage contacts and contact groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Autofill columns
CurrentVersion.description: This allows SharePoint Premium users to add natural language prompts to document library columns to extract or generate metadata from an uploaded file's contents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Workspaces now supports adding highlighting
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Edge Workspaces users are now able to collaborate in a synchronized way by adding highlighting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Updated submission results
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators and security operators will see updated results from submissions. These updates remove any confusion they might have with the current submission result.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
CurrentVersion.description: ,The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail. For example, you could reduce storage space by deleting meeting recordings, even when the OneDrive location has a longer retention policy. The feature also helps with scenarios such as data spillage cleanup and processing right to be forgotten requests.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot assisted Loop Page Creation
CurrentVersion.description:
Collaborate with copilot to go from a blank page to a structured document ready for collaboration as quickly as possible. Start from scratch, or select an existing page or template as the starting point and Copilot can modify it for the task at hand. 

This item is being removed from the roadmap as a duplicate of ID 141443

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals Graph API's
CurrentVersion.description: The Approvals Graph APIs allows developers to create and manage Approvals from any application. This set of APIs allows users to integrate Approvals with line of business application and automate creation and updates of approvals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-app feedback experience and policies for Desktop & Web clients
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the Settings menu for “Help & Feedback” and the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience for Teams Desktop & Web clients. Teams Desktop and Web clients will no longer use Microsoft Teams feedback policies for the in-app “Give Feedback/Suggest a Feature” experience, and instead use the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel chat helper
CurrentVersion.description: Customers can get more conversational answers to a broader range of Excel-related questions and prompts from Copilot. For example, the customer can ask how to accomplish a task and Copilot will respond with helpful steps that may include formulas to copy and use. In some cases, Copilot may explain a formula error and supply the corrected formula plus additional guidance to ensure the formula works properly.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Proactive document summarization
CurrentVersion.description: Automatically see a Copilot-generated summary of a document you open.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share content from webapp (browser) to Teams chats, channels, and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to share content from a standalone Teams webapp (from the browser) to Teams chats, channels and meetings (before and during the meeting).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage access to meeting artifacts such as meeting transcripts, recordings, AI-generated recap, and Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a new meeting option that gives meeting organizers the flexibility to manage which attendees have access to meeting artifacts such as transcript, recording, AI-generated recap, and Copilot. Meeting organizers can select from three options: (1) People with existing access, (2) Organizers and Co-organizers, or (3) Specific People.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in Government Community Cloud (GCC)
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using Town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 10k attendees, third-party eCDN support, green room, manage what attendees see, moderated Q&A, RTMP-in, live translated captions and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in Government Community Cloud (GCC) (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using Town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, third-party eCDN support, green room, manage what attendees see, moderated Q&A, RTMP-in, live translated captions and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Record opening behavior improvement in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint)
CurrentVersion.description: ,When a user opens a file in Office client applications (Word, Excel, & PowerPoint) that has a retention label managing the file as a locked record, it will now open as read-only and immediately not allow any user edits. A message will explain to the user why they cannot edit the file. This improvement brings parity to the behavior already in place for the online versions of these Office applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
CurrentVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
CurrentVersion.description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab support for role-based prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to filter Microsoft-authored prompts in Copilot Lab to view those that are associated with a specific job role category, e.g., Marketing, HR, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Closed captioning support in Teams Walkie Talkie
CurrentVersion.description: Walkie Talkie users can now view captions on the walkie talkie home screen, for transmissions being received.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Copilot works on any selection
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot will enable the edit box on any worksheet regardless of selection. Copilot will reason over the nearest table or data range to the customer’s selected grid area on the same worksheet.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Support for Data Ranges Resembling Tables
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot can now reason over data ranges with a single row of headers on top, even when they’re not Excel tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of enabled users and active users, as well as last activity date per user (all up and per Microsoft 365 app).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Time Suggestions Update
CurrentVersion.description: We are improving how suggested times are shown when scheduling a meeting. We are removing the automatically shown suggested times and instead you will need to enable a switch - Find a time - if you want to see suggested times. If you enable the toggle, the new availability view on time suggestion tiles will make it easier to find a suitable time with more clarity on everyone's availability. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Official Communities Discovery
CurrentVersion.description: Official Communities are discoverable in the Communities Discovery page. Under Recommended Communities, there is an Official Communities section which highlights the communities that have been verified by the network admins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Suggested M365 content in Callouts
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is an improvement on the Interactivity feature in Microsoft Stream, where users with edit access can add document and other links to Callouts at specific times in a video. The goal of the improvement is to make creating and editing of interactive videos easier and quicker for editors by suggesting resources to link based on their M365 user activity. If there are no relevant suggestions, this allows them to search for resources to make their videos interactive from within Microsoft Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Suggested M365 content in Callouts
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is an improvement on the Interactivity feature in Microsoft Stream, where users with edit access can add document and other links to Callouts at specific times in a video. The goal of the improvement is to make creating and editing of interactive videos easier and quicker for editors by suggesting resources to link based on their M365 user activity. If there are no relevant suggestions, this allows them to search for resources to make their videos interactive from within Microsoft Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Interactivity analytics
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives audience engagement metrics on interactive Stream videos. Users with edit access to a Stream video that contains links, polls, or callouts will be able to see the number of unique viewers and the percentage of those who viewed or clicked on interactive elements in the video, as well as average number of interactions and average attention time. These metrics help video owners understand which content is most engaging.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone devices will support Private line, a new functionality for Teams Phone that allows you to enable a private second phone number for a select set of users so they can receive inbound calls directly, by passing delegates, admins, or assistants. Calls to the private line are distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: People app on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: An updated People app on Teams phone devices will provide a simplified and faster experience to help users manage contacts easily.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent recording meeting policy support on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: When explicit consent recording meeting policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of participants on Teams phone devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Logs and alerts
CurrentVersion.description: ,With a new Azure Monitor integration, Universal Print customers can send detailed diagnostic logs to a Log Analytics workspace to conduct troubleshooting and configure custom alerts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Generate keyword query language from natural language prompt in eDiscovery with Copilot for Security
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot for Security is embedded in eDiscovery to enable users to provide a search prompt in natural language and will translate into keyword query language to help expedite the start of an eDiscovery search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Compliance boundary cmdlet tool for managing compliance boundary property
CurrentVersion.description: This cmdlet allows users to verify the compliance boundary property of a specific OneDrive site, ensuring that the value is correctly configured. If the property is not set or if the site is in arbitration, users can use this cmdlet to assign the property value for the site for compliance boundary to take effect.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Copilot Compose experience
CurrentVersion.description: ,Major improvements to our Copilot Compose experience include a polished, lightweight UI.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Contact View and Org Chart
CurrentVersion.description: ,This improves the large contact view experience, including the org chart and recent files.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
CurrentVersion.description: Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Blanket custom retention policies which apply to all Audit recordTypes
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is enhancing the Audit custom retention policy experience. With this change, customers can now create blanket custom retention policies which will apply to all Audit recordTypes. This capability will become available in addition to the existing support of manually selecting specific recordTypes in the custom policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced incident communication with DLP email templates
CurrentVersion.description: You can now elevate your DLP incident management with the power of customizable email templates designed to send email messages to your stakeholders when an event is generated for DLP Policy match. With dynamic variables and tokens at your disposal, you can effortlessly create and maintain email templates, ensuring consistency and efficiency in your communications, along with a documented audit trail. You can use these email templates to inform end users about incidents, their severity, or the analyst's recommendations; stay on top of remediation efforts by sending follow-up notifications to end users with due dates; keep analysts informed about incident updates and assignments; trigger escalation notifications to managers or other custom targets; notify approvers of pending items with ease; and many more scenarios like these.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling Assistant Updates
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the scheduling assistant view to help users have better readability. Some of these changes are in alignment to customer the feedback. These changes will also improve the grid lines, availability view, adding combined availability bar and much more. These updates will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Channel cards
CurrentVersion.description: Channel cards will provide you quick overview of key information about what is happening within the channel, including who is in the channel and the purpose of the channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: The new Microsoft Purview Portal entering GA
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Purview portal has a streamlined design and unified experience that helps you discover and access data security, risk, and compliance solutions for all your data, wherever it lives across your data estate. This means you can now extend protection across multiple data estates. Additionally, you can also access new features such as global search, new settings experience, and recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Import navigational links from SharePoint into Resources in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: On the desktop experience for Viva Connections, operators will be able to effortlessly import SharePoint links from their home site navigation and global navigation directly into the Resources section.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
CurrentVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom emojis and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: User can upload their own custom emojis and reactions to personalize their communication. Emojis will be available within the user’s  tenant in chat and channels via the emoji and reaction menus.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.
